==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Xiao

|vo_01_01_title      = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = If you awake to a knife at your throat, if monsters dig their claws into you, if death comes knocking at your door, call out my name. Adeptus Xiao. I will be here when you call.

|vo_02_01_title      = Chat: Idleness
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Idleness.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = Reduced to just standing around. How absurd.
|vo_02_02_title      = Chat: Wandering Spirits
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Wandering Spirits.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = The damned will sooner die again than lay a hand on me.
|vo_02_03_title      = Chat: Corruption
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Corruption.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = Grrgh... Those memories... So dark...

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = Demons do not stop for the rain. Move.
|vo_03_02_title      = After the Rain
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = The rain stopped? Hmph. I don't concern myself with the weather.
|vo_03_03_title      = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = Many mortals fear lightning... Incomprehensible. Fear of something so common.
|vo_03_04_title      = When It Snows
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = Once the snow is thick enough, we can eat it.

|vo_04_01_title      = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = We're wasting time. Let's go.
|vo_04_02_title      = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = Lunch... We'll go back to Wangshu Inn.
|vo_04_03_title      = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = Night... When the darkness comes to envelope you. Don't stay outside.
|vo_04_04_title      = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = Go. I'll be here.

|vo_05_01_title      = About {name}: Inhuman
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Inhuman.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = I'm far from human. I can't make much of human emotions.
|vo_05_02_title      = About {name}: Liyue
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Liyue.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = Liyue is changing. Rapidly... Forget it, it means nothing to me.

|vo_06_01_title      = About Us: Warnings
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Warnings.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = If a day comes where even you are taken by the darkness, it will be up to me.
|vo_06_02_title      = About Us: Trust
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Trust.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = Do not fall prey to the darkness. I have no mercy.<br />Though perhaps you can stand your ground alone.
|vo_06_03_title      = About Us: Drowsiness
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Drowsiness.ogg
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_tx         = Who's there? Oh... You think I sleep? You have no respect for the ways of the adepti.
|vo_06_04_title      = About Us: Lantern Rite
|vo_06_04_friendship = 6
|vo_06_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Lantern Rite.ogg
|vo_06_04_tx         = The Lantern Rite? The time for humans to discard their glowing trash into the sea has returned... How childish...<br />Though if you insist... I will go with you.

|vo_07_01_title      = About the [[Vision]]: Desires
|vo_07_01_friendship = 3
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision - Desires.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = Visions? Desire? Ha. Do not judge adepti by your mortal ideals. I have no desire.
|vo_07_02_title      = About the [[Vision]]: Reasons
|vo_07_02_friendship = 5
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision - Reasons.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = Hiding? I'm hiding nothing. I just won't speak of desire to others.<br />Do mortals not have a rule about spoken wishes never coming true? Hm? What do you mean that's not the same?
|vo_07_03_title      = Something to Share
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = I deal in death. If you cannot bring yourself to kill &mdash; speak my name.
|vo_07_04_title      = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = Dihua Islet was once deserted.<br />Though that was many decades... no, centuries ago...

|vo_08_01_title      = About [[Zhongli]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_quest      = A New Star Approaches
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = Can I ask... Zhongli &mdash; what does he do with his days? Huh? Birds, antiques, flowers...<br />Hmm... What deeper meaning do they hold?
|vo_08_01_mention    = Zhongli

|vo_08_02_title      = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = Beidou? I have nothing to do with her. Though there is such a thing as the leviathan. As a mere human, she has proven her power in defeating [[Haishan]].
|vo_08_02_mention    = Beidou,Haishan

|vo_08_03_title      = About [[Baizhu]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Baizhu.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = You want... Baizhu to make a medicine to take away my pain? I understand your intentions, but mortal medicine has no effect on adepti.
|vo_08_03_mention    = Baizhu

|vo_08_04_title      = About [[Hu Tao]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Hu Tao.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = Hu Tao? Her liveliness is irritating. Fortunately, she is also humorous, so you need not worry about her growing into a boring human.
|vo_08_04_mention    = Hu Tao

|vo_08_05_title      = About [[Venti]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Venti.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = Venti? So that's the name he goes by. His tunes are... forget it.
|vo_08_05_mention    = Venti

|vo_08_06_title      = About [[Ganyu]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Ganyu.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = Ganyu is neither mortal nor illuminated beast. Wandering both the mortal and Adepti realms with duty as her sole guide, it was inevitable that she would become perplexed... What? Me? You believe a Yaksha who knows nothing more than how to massacre countless souls and emerge unscathed is a suitable mentor for such an individual? ...Your mind occupies a very different world from that which your body inhabits.
|vo_08_06_mention    = Ganyu

|vo_08_07_title      = About [[Shenhe]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_quest      = The Crane Returns on the Wind
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shenhe.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = It seems Shenhe places a great deal of trust in you. Well, how could she not. There are few people in the world as kind and good-natured as you.
|vo_08_07_mention    = Shenhe

|vo_08_08_title      = About [[Yelan]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yelan.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = I've heard that she once investigated The Chasm, following the trail of the Millelith. If she can investigate mysteries like that on her own, she must be someone of rare skill.
|vo_08_08_mention    = Yelan

|vo_09_01_title      = More About {name}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = I'm willing to protect you.<br />But don't think about getting close, and stay out of my way, or all that awaits you is regret.
|vo_09_02_title      = More About {name}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = In the thousands of years that have passed, I have taken countless wraiths. If you want no trouble, stay away from me. See me as a weapon, and nothing more.
|vo_09_03_title      = More About {name}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = Their voices... I can always hear them. Their screams, their cries, demanding more death...<br />This is my burden to carry. It has nothing to do with you.
|vo_09_04_title      = More About {name}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = Morax...? What do you know of this name?!<br />He gave me the name Xiao, and released me from the endless pain I endured.<br />I will not forgive those that dare to speak against him, even you.
|vo_09_04_mention    = Morax
|vo_09_05_title      = More About {name}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = It's too late. The connection between us is too strong. Even if you wanted to, it's too late to sever it. Hm? You've never thought to sever it?<br />*sigh* This eternal dance of demon subjugation... My fight goes on.<br />But I would like to know more about you.

|vo_10_01_title      = {name}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = There's nothing timid about you, having the courage to ask about my hobbies.<br />So, fight me. How long do you think your body will last against my blows?
|vo_10_02_title      = {name}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = Trouble? Ha. Trouble means nothing to adepti. There is no trouble that can last for a thousand years.
|vo_10_03_title      = Favorite Food: Almond Tofu
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food - Almond Tofu.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = I have no interest in mortal food. Cooking is tedious and the wait is long. The one thing I can manage to stomach is Almond Tofu.
|vo_10_04_title      = Favorite Food: Memories
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food - Memories.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = The taste of Almond Tofu feels like a fond dream...
|vo_10_05_title      = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_05_tx         = Wait. I am expected to place slices of meat in wrappings myself? And then... eat them? Together? Ugh, humans these days do not know what they are doing.

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO Xiao Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = Mm... Not bad... Why are you staring at me?

|vo_11_02_title      = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO Xiao Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = No need.

|vo_11_03_title      = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO Xiao Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = Try something else next time.

|vo_12_01_title      = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = This mortal concept of commemorating the day of your birth really is redundant. Wait. Have this. It's a butterfly I made from leaves.<br />Okay. Take it. It's an adepti amulet &mdash; it staves off evil.

|vo_13_01_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = This is it? Nothing worth getting excited about.
|vo_13_02_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = New power? All it will be used for is death.
|vo_13_03_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = The limit to one's power is self-destruction. Answer me. Why do you persist?
|vo_13_04_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = Countless souls have fallen prey to these hands. I too have been swallowed by the darkness &mdash; and yet you dare to drive me on. You may think of me as... your companion. You seek to find me salvation?<br />...You... really are a difficult being to comprehend.
}}
